Function Documentation

void RTC001_ClearFlagStatus ( RTC001_FlagType  Flag)

This function clears the given RTC flag.

Parameters:
[in]FlagIndicates which flag to clear. Use the symbolic constants enumerated by RTC001_FlagType.
Returns:
void

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

  #include <DAVE3.h>
  int main(void)
  {
    // Initialize Apps
    DAVE_Init(); // RTC001_Init() will be called within DAVE_Init()
    RTC001_Enable();
    while(!RTC001_GetFlagStatus(HOURS_FLAG))
    {
      // Hour event happened
      RTC001_ClearFlagStatus(HOURS_FLAG);
    }
    // ... infinite loop ...
    while(1)
    {}
  }


Definition at line 381 of file RTC001.c.

status_t RTC001_Clock_GetTime ( RTC001_TimeHandle *  timeptr)

This function gets the current time from RTC.

Parameters:
[in]timeptrPointer to structure in which current time is returned
Returns:
status_t
DAVEApp_SUCCESS : If RTC time is read successfully
RTC001_ERROR : If any error during reading

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

 #include <DAVE3.h>
 int main(void)
 {
   RTC001_TimeHandle CurrentTime;
   // Initialize Apps
   DAVE_Init(); // RTC001_Init() will be called within DAVE_Init()
   RTC001_Enable();
   while(!RTC001_GetFlagStatus(HOURS_FLAG))
   {
     // Read current time
     RTC001_Clock_GetTime(&CurrentTime);
   }
   // ... infinite loop ...
   while(1)
   {}
 }


Definition at line 465 of file RTC001.c.

References RTC001_TimeHandle::DaWe, RTC001_TimeHandle::Days, RTC001_TimeHandle::Hours, RTC001_TimeHandle::Min, RTC001_TimeHandle::Month, RTC001_ERROR, RTC001_TimeHandle::Sec, and RTC001_TimeHandle::Year.

status_t RTC001_Clock_SetTime ( RTC001_TimeHandle *  timeptr)

This function sets the RTC time. It is recommended to Disable RTC module before using this function.

Parameters:
[in]timeptrPointer to structure which contains time values to be configured
Returns:
status_t
DAVEApp_SUCCESS : If the RTC time is successfully configured
RTC001_ERROR : If any error during reading the time

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

 #include <DAVE3.h>
 int main(void)
 {
   RTC001_TimeHandle SetTime;
   uint32_t Status;
   // Initialize Apps
   DAVE_Init(); // RTC001_Init() will be called within DAVE_Init()
   RTC001_Disable();
   SetTime.Sec = 32;
   SetTime.Min = 30;
   SetTime.Hours = 4;
   SetTime.Days = 15;
   SetTime.Month = 5;
   SetTime.Year = 2012;
   Status = RTC001_Clock_SetTime(&SetTime);
   if(Status == DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
   {
     //Success
   }
   RTC001_Enable();
   // ... infinite loop ...
   while(1)
   {}
 }


Definition at line 501 of file RTC001.c.

References RTC001_TimeHandle::Days, RTC001_TimeHandle::Hours, RTC001_TimeHandle::Min, RTC001_TimeHandle::Month, RTC001_ERROR, RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE, RTC001_TimeHandle::Sec, and RTC001_TimeHandle::Year.

status_t RTC001_ConfigAlarm ( const RTC001_HandleType *  Handle,
RTC001_TimeHandle *  timeptr,
AlarmCallBackPtr  CallBack,
uint32_t  CbArg 
)

This function configures the RTC001 Alarm. If the Alarm Event interrupt is connected to SCU, then optionally a call back function can be registered for the interrupt.

Parameters:
[in]HandleRTC app Handle
[in]timeptrPointer to structure which contains Alarm Time
[in]CallBackAlarm event call back function. If the Alarm Event is connected to SCU, the call back will be registered with NVIC_SCU001 app. If NULL is given, then call back is not registered
[in]CbArg(Optional) argument to be passed to the call back function
Returns:
status_t
DAVEApp_SUCCESS : if Alarm configuration is successful
RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE: If any of the parameter is invalid
RTC001_ERROR : If any error during Alarm configuration

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

 #include <DAVE3.h>
 static volatile bool AlarmEvent;
 void Alarm_CallBack(uint32_t Temp)
 {
   AlarmEvent = TRUE;
 }
 int main(void)
 {
   uint32_t Status;
   RTC001_TimeHandle Alarm_Time;
    // ... Initializes Apps ...
   DAVE_Init();
   Alarm_Time.Sec = 32;
   Alarm_Time.Min = 30;
   Alarm_Time.Hours = 4;
   Alarm_Time.Days = 15;
   Alarm_Time.Month = 5;
   Alarm_Time.Year = 2012;
   Status = RTC001_ConfigAlarm(&RTC001_Handle,&Alarm_Time,Alarm_CallBack,0);
   if(Status == DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
   {
     //Alarm is created successfully
   }
   // ... infinite loop ...
   while(1)
   {}
 }

void RTC001_DeInit ( void  )

Deinitialization function for the app. Current version of the function is empty.

Returns:
void

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

  #include <DAVE3.h>
  int main(void)
  {
    // Initialize Apps
    DAVE_Init(); // RTC001_Init() will be called within DAVE_Init()
    RTC001_DeInit();
    // ... infinite loop ...
    while(1)
    {}
  }


Definition at line 274 of file RTC001.c.

status_t RTC001_Disable ( void  )

This function disables the RTC Module. Time and Alarm registers are cleared. Can be used to Disable RTC module before configuring RTC Time.

Returns:
status
DAVEApp_SUCCESS : If Disable successful
RTC001_ERROR : If any error during Disable

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

  #include <DAVE3.h>
  int main(void)
  {
    // Initialize Apps
    DAVE_Init(); // RTC001_Init() will be called within DAVE_Init()
    RTC001_Disable();
    // ... infinite loop ...
    while(1)
    {}
  }


Definition at line 314 of file RTC001.c.

References RTC001_ERROR.

status_t RTC001_Enable ( void  )

Enables the RTC module. May be called if RTC module is disabled previously.

Returns:
status
DAVEApp_SUCCESS : for success
RTC001_ERROR : for failure case

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

  #include <DAVE3.h>
  int main(void)
  {
    // Initialize Apps
    DAVE_Init(); // RTC001_Init() will be called within DAVE_Init()
    RTC001_Enable();
    // ... infinite loop ...
    while(1)
    {}
  }

References RTC001_ERROR.

status_t RTC001_GetFlagStatus ( RTC001_FlagType  Flag)

Get the status of specified flag.

Parameters:
[in]FlagIndicates which Flag to be checked. Use the symbolic constants enumerated by RTC001_FlagType.
Returns:
status
RTC001_SET : Flag is set
RTC001_RESET : Flag is reset

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

 #include <DAVE3.h>
 int main(void)
 {
   // Initialize Apps
   DAVE_Init(); // RTC001_Init() will be called within DAVE_Init()
   RTC001_Enable();
   while(!RTC001_GetFlagStatus(HOURS_FLAG))
   {
     // Hour event happened
     RTC001_ClearFlagStatus(HOURS_FLAG);
   }
   // ... infinite loop ...
   while(1)
   {}
 }


Definition at line 357 of file RTC001.c.

References RTC001_RESET, and RTC001_SET.

status_t RTC001_Time ( time_t *  time_value)

This function returns the time in seconds since the epoch time(01/01/1970).

Parameters:
[in]time_valuePointer to an object of type time_t, for returning the time.
Returns:
status_t
DAVEApp_SUCCESS : if time value is calculated successfully
RTC001_ERROR : If any error

Reentrant: NO

Example: 

 #include <DAVE3.h>
 int main(void)
 {
   status_t status = RTC001_ERROR;
   time_t Time_Sec;
   // ... Initializes Apps ...
   DAVE_Init();
   status = RTC001_Time(&Time_Sec);
   if(status != DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
   {
           //error
   }
   RTC001_Disable();
   // ... infinite loop ...
   while(1)
   {}
 }
